text: == Deaths == * March 12 – Emperor Go-Kogon of Japan (born 1336) * July 19 – Petrarch, Italian poet (born 1304) * November 25 – Prince Philip II of Taranto * King Gongmin of Goryeo * Joanna of Flanders, Duchess of Brittany (born 1295) * Gao Qi, Chinese poet (born 1336) * William Whittlesey, Archbishop of Canterbury
